description: the layout for your runic pillars
name: Runic Ritual

pages.text:
The Slabs must be set out as pictured with all the same colours and cannot be inert! \
      \
      The rune slabs will have a random state after being placed, the player however is able to change the state
      manually by right-clicking the slab with a block thorn staff.
      Also make sure to light the runic core with a flint and steel or fire charge by right-clicking.
pages.title: Runic Sacrifice

pages.text: Killing a hostile mob on top of the runic core will complete the ritual.
